response.original_title: Cherub Wings: Vol. 10: And It Was So!
response.overview: Using a combination of live action and colorful 3-D animation, this Christian children's series follows the high jinks of a spirited angel named Cherub Wings, who's been commissioned by God to present a variety show that will help kids build their faith. In this Easter-themed episode, a rousing space-chase in cherub chariots topples the little angel and his friend Chubby into an awesome awareness of God's mighty power.
response.title: Cherub Wings: Vol. 10: And It Was So!
